title: Cyberpunk 2077 Refund Debacle - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.15.20
description:
Blessing and Imran talk about more Cyberpunk 2077 controversy and Nintendo's Indie World Showcase.

00:00:00 - Start
00:04:40 - Housekeeping
PSILY XOXO is recording this Friday and it’s the PSILY AWARDS so go over to Patreon.com/KindaFunnyGames and write in with your picks for the Best Of in PlayStation in 2020.
Andy is going to be streaming Cyberpunk 2077 showing off Ray Tracing and all that goodness on his Nvidia RTX 3080 Tuesday December 15th from 11am-1pm PT 
We Have Cool Friends today is with Life Is Strange and Horizon’s Ashly Burch!
The Roper Report   -
00:06:15 - The Cyberpunk Saga continues: CD Projekt Red explains why they didn’t delay
00:22:32 - PlayStation and Xbox are denying Cyberpunk 2077 refund requests
00:24:36 - “Is there anything that Sony could do to save face from CDPR's blunder?” - Angry (Ryan) T From Tennessee
00:31:14 - Nintendo’s Indie World Showcase Showcase
00:38:41 - Nintendo Switch Gets Funimation App
00:41:37 - The Mortal Kombat movie has a release date
00:44:18 -  Ads 
00:49:07 - Out today 
 Reader mail   -
00:53:44 - “Funimation is now on the...Nintendo Switch?? Do you think this addition means anything for the Switch's future?“ - Gabe Hewitt
00:59:10 - Squad Up: Dan Likes Everything - Xbox - neftones
01:00:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Gary Whitta
